parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM devis WHERE tenant_id = '" + $json.tenantId + "' AND numero_devis IS NOT NULL AND date_devis IS NOT NULL AND " + ($json.statut ? "statut = '" + $json.statut + "'" : "statut NOT IN ('commandee')") + " AND " + ($json.clientFinalId ? "client_final_id = '" + $json.clientFinalId + "'" : "1=1") }}

={{ "SELECT d.id, d.tenant_id, d.client_final_id, d.numero_devis, d.date_devis, d.date_validite, d.montant_ht, d.montant_ttc, d.tva_taux, d.description, d.mode_paiement, d.statut, d.invoice_id, d.lien_pdf, d.created_at, d.updated_at, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.prenom as client_prenom, cf.email as client_email, cf.telephone as client_telephone, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale FROM devis d LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON d.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE d.tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND d.numero_devis IS NOT NULL AND d.date_devis IS NOT NULL AND " + ($('02. Parser').first().json.statut ? "d.statut = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.statut + "'" : "d.statut NOT IN ('commandee')") + " AND " + ($('02. Parser').first().json.clientFinalId ? "d.client_final_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.clientFinalId + "'" : "1=1") + " ORDER BY d.date_devis DESC LIMIT " + $('02. Parser').first().json.limit + " OFFSET " + $('02. Parser').first().json.offset }}
